sentences.english: Although De Gang can blame the sea aloud, but he is same however ashamed is right Chun Yan.

sentences.english: Ten years war to heaven tears unworthy, He Yan center?

sentences.english: Of course we feel sorry for the fans.
Was he ashamed that he hadn't fulfilled his promise? And why hadn't I helped Dad find Gilbert before he died?

sentences.english: Don't let your boss make you feel guilty enough to take work home with you.
sentences.chinese: 别把工作带回家做，以免有愧对老板的感觉。

sentences.english: You are unable ashamed to the conscience but hush.

sentences.english: When she got home after a natural feel closed rules live up to his father head hit the wall body self-harm.

sentences.english: All anticipations are broken personally by you!
sentences.chinese: 愧对自己，是该接受现实。
